key_risks: Profitability concerns due to high operating expenses and difficulty converting revenue growth into net profitability
Dependence on third-party platforms like Google and Bing, making the business vulnerable to changes in algorithms or policies
Competitive pressures from rivals such as Moz, BrightLocal, and Uberall, with pricing model criticisms affecting customer retention
Customer retention issues, with a declining dollar-based net retention rate of 91% in Q3 2023
controversies: Pricing model changes leading to customer attrition, particularly among large clients
Unusually large call option purchases in November 2023, indicating speculative investor activity despite stock price volatility
social_issues: Customer support and retention challenges, with 62% of consumers favoring brands offering self-service support options
